description.english: Call on the right phone number without fixing bilboard

description.english: Do not attack the inhabitants of Lisaland
description.italian: Non attaccare gli abitanti di Lisaland

description.english: Win the jackpot without breaking the slot machine

description.hungarian: Nyerd meg a jackpotot a nyerőgép összetörésével!

Scambia un biglietto per della carne

description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a 3. fejezet 2. részét anélkül, hogy meghalnál egy aknától!

description.english: Spend time with a friend by the fire
description.italian: Trascorri del tempo con un amico accanto al fuoco

description.polish: Spędź czas z przyjacielem przy ognisku

description.italian: Apri la cassaforte del cane libero
description.hungarian: Nyisd ki a szabad kutya széfjét!

description.english: Annoy the Observer and cause an alarm

description.english: Complete «Million Dollar Dead Baby» without mistakes

description.english: Complete the final battle without taking any damage

description.italian: Gioca a Noch con un amico
description.russian: Поиграть в Noch вместе с другом
